name: Arnold Palmer
quote: Success in this game depends less on strength of body than strength of mind and character.

name: Arnold Palmer
quote: I have a tip that can take five stroke off anyone's game. It's called an eraser

name: Arnold Palmer
quote: Golf is deceptively simple and endlessly complicated; it satisfies the soul and frustrates the intellect. It is at the same time rewarding and maddening – and it is without a doubt the greatest game mankind has ever invented.

name: Arnold Palmer
quote: The game has such a hold on golfers because they compete not only against an opponent, but also against the course, against par, and most surely - against themselves.

name: Arnold Palmer
quote: Always make a total effort, even when the odds are against you.

name: Arnold Palmer
quote: Putting is like wisdom – partly a natural gift and partly the accumulation of experience.

name: Tiger Woods
quote: I get to play golf for a living. What more can you ask for, getting paid for doing what you love.

name: Sergio Garcia
quote: If you worry about making bogeys, it makes the game that much more difficult. You put more pressure on yourself without even noticing it. It makes a difference to take it easy when things aren’t going right.

name: Sergio Garcia
quote: There’s no such thing as bad weather, only inappropriate clothing!

name: Sergio Garcia
quote: Golf… is the infallible test. The man who can go into a patch of rough alone, with the knowledge that only God is watching him, and play his ball where it lies, is the man who will serve you faithfully and well.

name: Lorii Myers
quotes: The value of routine; trusting your swing.

name: Gary Player
quotes: A good golfer has the determination to win and the patience to wait for the breaks.

name: Jack Nicklaus
quotes: Arnold’s place in history will be as the man who took golf from being a game for the few to a sport for the masses. He was the catalyst who made that happen.

name: Jack Nicklaus
quotes: Resolve never to quit, never to give up, no matter what the situation

name: Jack Nicklaus
quotes: The older you get the stronger the wind gets — and it's always in your face.

name: Jack Nicklaus
quotes: Learn the fundamentals of the game and stick to them. Band-Aid remedies never last.

name: Jack Nicklaus
quotes: Professional golf is the only sport where, if you win 20% of the time, you're the best.

name: Jack Nicklaus
quotes: Sometimes the biggest problem is in your head. You've got to play a shot instead of wondering where your next bad shot is coming from.

name: Jack Nicklaus
quotes: Confidence is the single most important factorin the game. No matter how great your natural talent, there is only one way to obtain and sustain it: work.
